page.title: 11THE LAKE
page.content: Mr B was born in Abbots Bromley, and except for 6 years during World War Two has always lived here. He and his wife lived where his grandson lives now, and they had a shop - general store - and he was a painter and decorator. Fifteen years ago when new houses were built behind his land he had the lake made. It is fed by springs so the water is pure and clear. We saw the site of the village pump (for that end of the village.) Where the lake is now was just boggy ground before. The site of the garden is about 11/2 acres.The lake is stocked with trout in two small ponds are 160 trout and 60 more rainbow and brown trout. There are a few American Brooks trout. The heron has been coming to the lake and kingfisher after the youngest fish. Many wild flowers bloom around the lake.
